alert.note: Alert for Benton; Marshall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 1:53PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Marshall, northern Benton, west central Henderson, eastern Fayette, Hardeman, southeastern Haywood, Madison and western Chester Counties through 245 PM CST... At 153 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Holly Grove to near Mt Pleasant. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Henderson, Bolivar, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Whiteville, Somerville, Silerton, Masseyville, Hillville, Mifflin, Michigan City, Bemis, Lagrange, Cloverport, Mercer, Middleton, Rossville, Moscow and Williston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi...and western Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CST for western Tennessee.
